TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SKSvgCanvas extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A specialized which generates SVG commands from its draw calls.
Docs.remarks: The canvas may buffer some drawing calls, so the output is not guaranteed to be valid or complete until the canvas instance is deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKCanvas Create (SkiaSharp.SKRect bounds, SkiaSharp.SKXmlWriter writer);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKCanvas Create(valuetype SkiaSharp.SKRect bounds, class SkiaSharp.SKXmlWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.param: The initial SVG viewport (viewBox attribute on the root SVG element).
The writer to recieve the XML data.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of which writes to the specified XML writer.
Docs.remarks: Ownership of the XML writer is not transfered to the canvas, but it must stay valid during the lifetime of the returned canvas.
